name: Hashy
body:
Hashy is a utility function which allows for CRUD operations on `window.location.hash`.

## Get `window.location.hash = 'key=value';`
`hashy(); // '#key=value'` ## Set `window.location.hash = 'key=value';`
`hashy('new_key=new_value');`
`hashy(); // '#new_key=new_value'` ## Destroy `hashy('key=value');`
`hashy(false);`
`hashy(); // ''` ## Set k,v pair `hashy('key', 'value');`
`hashy(); // #key=value` ## Update k,v pair `hashy('key', 'value');`
`hashy('key', 'new_value');`
`hashy(); // #key=new_value` ## Append k,v pair `hashy('key', 'value');`
`hashy('key_1', 'value_1');`
`hashy(); // #key=value&key_1=value_1` ## Set multiple k,v pairs `hashy(['key', 'value'], ['key_1', 'value_1']);`
`hashy(); // #key=value&key_1=value_1` ## Update multiple k,v pairs `hashy(['key', 'value'], ['key_1', 'value_1']);`
`hashy(['key', 'new_value'], ['key_1', 'new_value_1']);`
`hashy(); // #key=new_value&key_1=new_value_1` ## Append multiple k,v pairs `hashy('key', 'value');`
`hashy(['key_1', 'value_1'], ['key_2', 'value_2']);`
`hashy(); // #key=value&key_1=value_1&key_2=value_2` ## TODO * add support for appending to non-k,v pair hashes
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
